Package polyhedra

Class BoundingBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • polyhedra.BoundingBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class BoundingBox
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Rectangular prism representing the boundaries x, y, and z of a polyhedron.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BoundingBox()
      Default Constructor.
      BoundingBox​(double xUpper, double yUpper, double zUpper)
      Construct a bounding box from using the origin (0, 0, 0) as the lower point and supplied upper (x, y, z).
      BoundingBox​(Point lowerLeft, Point upperRight)
      Construct a bounding box from lower and upper points that define it.

      Apply a scaling factor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoundingBox

        public BoundingBox()
        Default Constructor. Set both vertices to (0, 0, 0)

      • BoundingBox

        public BoundingBox​(Point lowerLeft,
                   Point upperRight)
        Construct a bounding box from lower and upper points that define it.
        Parameters:
        lowerLeft - point representing min(x), min(y), min(z)
        upperRight - point representing max(x), max(y), max(z)

      • BoundingBox

        public BoundingBox​(double xUpper,
                   double yUpper,
                   double zUpper)
        Construct a bounding box from using the origin (0, 0, 0) as the lower point and supplied upper (x, y, z).
        Parameters:
        xUpper - x-component of upper point, representing max(x)
        yUpper - y-component of upper point, representing max(y)
        zUpper - z-component of upper point, representing max(z)

    • Method Detail

      • getLowerLeftVertex

        public Point getLowerLeftVertex()
        Retrieve the lower boundary.
        Returns:
        lower boundary Point(min(x), min(y), min(z))

      • getUpperRightVertex

        public Point getUpperRightVertex()
        Retrieve the upper boundary.
        Returns:
        lower boundary Point(max(x), max(y), max(z))

      • setUpperRightVertex

        public void setUpperRightVertex​(Point newPoint)
        Set the upper boundary using a Point.
        Parameters:
        newPoint - point representing max(x), max(y), max(z)

      • setUpperRightVertex

        public void setUpperRightVertex​(double x,
                                double y,
                                double z)
        Set the upper boundary.
        Parameters:
        x - new max(x)
        y - new max(y)
        z - new max(z)

      • merge

        public void merge​(BoundingBox other)
        Merge two bounding boxes, taking the largest values for each of x, y, and z.
        Parameters:
        other - bounding box to merge with `this`

      • scale

        public void scale​(double scalingFactor)
        Apply a scaling factor.
        Parameters:
        scalingFactor - scaling factor that is greater than or equal to 1
